The Trump Administration is threatening to withdraw from another international treaty as NPR's Yuki Noguchi reports the latest involves a social agreement that Trump asserts gives Chinese companies an unfair advantage when they ship goods to the u._s.
For a hundred and forty four years the U.S has been part of the universal postal union which sets shipping rates for international deliveries poor developing countries including China pay lower rates well rates in the U.S and Europe are higher

The White House counsel Don McGahn has left his post NPR's Scott Horsley reports McGahn was the architect of President Trump's push to shift the federal courts in a more conservative direction
Don McGahn oversaw the president's judicial screening process helping to install dozens of conservative judges on the federal bench culminating with the bruising confirmation of Supreme Court justice Brett Kavanaugh earlier this month
Before coming to the White House began served as Donald Trump's campaign lawyer it was in that role he suggested that Trump publish a list of potential high court nominees to replace the late Justice Antonin Scalia

And analysis of ancient rocks in Greenland has found that they do not contain the world's oldest fossils and beer is Nell Greenfieldboyce reports that instead the rocks are almost certainly just rocks
Back in twenty six team a team of researchers said they had discovered cone shaped imprint of early microbial communities in rocks from Greenland there three point seven billion years old that would have made them the oldest evidence of life ever found
Now though a different group of scientists has gone to Greenland to take a look
In the journal nature they say the unusual structures were actually created by geologic processes that stretched and squeeze the rock they also analyzed the structures chemistry and again found no sign that microbes created them
The researchers who made the original claim have disputed these findings they still maintain that they have found the world's oldest fossils Nell Greenfieldboyce NPR News
